price: 17. Alobi: Nkolo! Na bolamu oyo opesaki ngai, nakosunga batomboki ata mokolo moko te.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā anʿamta ʿalayya falan akūna ẓahīran lil'muj'rimīna
